scheme_name: Mahila Kamgar Kaushal Unnayan Evan Theka Shramik, Hamaal Tatha Ghareloo Mahila Kamgaar Parivar Sashaktikaran Yojana
description: This scheme in Chhattisgarh provides skill development training in various trades and financial assistance to women workers, including contract laborers, porters, and domestic workers, to empower their families and promote self-reliance.

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 2 Lakhs for self-employment ventures
benefits.stipend: Monthly stipend during training, up to Rs. 1,500

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Chhattisgarh
occupation_criteria: Contract laborers, porters, domestic workers, or similar marginalized workers

eligible_activities: Skill training in trades like tailoring, beauty services, or food processing
Purchase of equipment for income-generating activities

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Labor Department
Submit the application with proof of occupation and residency
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and income certificate
Applications are reviewed by the department
Selected candidates are enrolled in training and receive assistance
application_process.note: Applicants must commit to completing the training program

special_notes: Priority is given to women from low-income households
Training programs are tailored to local job markets
